description_text: Will the upgrade kit fit sim jack pedals? If so can i take out the HDs as i already have 3 on my pedals. Thank yooou

conversations.body_text: Hi Aron Gard,  SimJack pedals do not use hydraulic dampers; they use gas springs. Our system uses pure hydraulic dampers instead. From a structural and mounting perspective, it should be compatible in theory.Â
